TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
you suffer pneumonia and die a horrible death

i wish i can make up a hard riddle

Granted, it involves a brick and your face. Little did you know that a proper riddle involves charades.

I wish for a portable rail gun.

Granted. It's portable, on the track it was built on. You asked for a gun on rails. The rails are a dead end

I wish for more Iced Tea

Granted. (hands you a block of ice with a tea leaf inside)

I wish for someone to know my avatar is (aside from nnhifong.)

Granted. (hands you a block of ice with a tea leaf inside)

I wish for someone to know my avatar is (aside from nnhifong.)

everyone knows your avatar, but as the cat from Kiki's delivery service.

I wish Chemistry was easy.

Granted, but all other branches science will now be exponentially harder for you.

I wish for a plasma.

You get the plasma. It becomes unstable, explodes and spills on your face, burning as if you put your head inside the Sun.

I wish I had a HAL 9000.

Granted. It's in your mouth, killing you instantly

I wish that people can read ivisitext

Granted. Unfortunately, no wish.

I wish for the weather to be a little merciful.

Granted, but the Earth is not. Nature's uprising begins.

I wish for some food.

Granted. It's in advanced state of decomposition, though.

I want a pet dolphin.

Granted, but you have no place to keep it in

I wish for a perfect potato

Granted, but everything else is now imperfect, or at least more so than before.

I wish for a number even larger than infinity.

Granted. But you broke mathematics in the progress and are beaten up by mathematicians

I wish for an bottomless bag of crisps (chips in America)

Granted. The bag of crisps has no bottom, and all the crisps fell out in transit.

I with for a roll of ductape.

Granted. Only to find out that it's just a masking tape in disguise.

I wish for the ability to wake up in time later (freakin early morning clashesclasses)

Granted, but you wake up so late in time, the heat death of the universe has occurred.

I wish for a bacon sandwich with ketchup.

Granted. It's moldy.

I wish for Anonymous to run the world.

Granted, The world becomes a dictatorship in which gamers are stereotyped as "A threat to society".

I wish I had a time machine to make games come out faster.

Granted, but it malfunctions, aging you a billion years in the blink of an eye. Sigh. Now I've gotta tidy up the dust pile...

I wish people were less careless with their time machines.

Granted, People are now so careful they don't even want to use them, and they grow as worthless as dirt.

I wish I could get to Tylo...

Granted. You, as in YOU, are on Tylo, without a spacesuit.

I wish people understood GMO's better.

Granted, Now people know more about them than you, and you feel lonely.

I wish I had a Pistachio cake that was delicious and NOT poisoned.

Granted, but someone laced it with tiny shards of obsidian. You're still as dead as if it were poisoned. Massive internal bleeding isn't fun.

I wish for a sword crafted from obsidian.

Granted. No.

I wish for a sword. A dull one. Very dull. So dull that it doesn't exist.
